channel.description: Recent content in interviewing on Alexander Saavedra

item.title: Transforming The Generic Interview
item.description: Transforming Generic Interview Questions This is an ongoing culmination of general interviewing tips. I hope these are helpful to you as well. 1. Tell me about yourself “You are not your job, you’re not how much money you have in the bank. You are not the car you drive. You’re not the contents of your wallet.” ~ Fight Club This is your moment to cover things not listed on your resume, don’t reiterate your resume!
